text: Thomas Charles Horne (born March 28, 1945) is a Canadian-American politician, attorney, businessman, and activist. He has been the Arizona Superintendent of Public Instruction since 2023, having served from 2003 to 2011. He is a member of the Republican Party. He was Attorney General of Arizona from 2011 to 2015. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Arizona attorneys general Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Politicians from Montreal Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Canadian lawyers Category:Canadian activists Category:American political activists Category:Businesspeople from Arizona Category:Businesspeople from New York (state) Category:Politicians from New York (state) Category:Lawyers from New York (state) Category:Canadian businesspeople
title: Tom Horne
